ygData.subject: Re: Page for sell
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It Probably Is After the patch Resist item became stack able ( The old olds never changed just got new ones) So Its a New Version of an Old research item,
ygData.messageBody:
cnj005@... wrote:

> From: cnj005@...
>
> I reside on the Xegony server and I have recently found a "faded Velishoul's Tome Page", I've never seen this item before, nor anything of it's kind, because it's stackable. Everyone tells me that it is an enchanter's research item, but i don't honestly believe that because it can be stacked. My question's are:
>
> 1) is this an enchanter research item?
> 2) if not then what is it for?
> 3) is this item rare?
> 4) what would someone pay for this item?
>

It Probably Is After the patch Resist item became stack able ( The old olds never changed just got new ones) So Its a New Version of an Old research item, keep it sell it Trade it ( if your researching)


--

Jamie Macdonald

A.K.A
Magis DarkStone
Mercenary Mage

"I've been a Wizard, Magician, Sorcerer, And Charlatan."
